body_html: Ah found the problem I think - my fault! Not yet tested but......I have been predicting in chunks using a chunksize=5 so it would work on my laptop with 8GB RAM. That means only 5 rows can be done in parallel. I need to increase this for bigger machine which has more memory.

body: Ah found the problem I think - my fault! Not yet tested but......I have been predicting in chunks using a chunksize=5 so it would work on my laptop with 8GB RAM. That means only 5 rows can be done in parallel. I need to increase this for bigger machine which has more memory.
